attributes.action: Compensate EU nationals in the UK  for the trauma created by Brexit uncertainty.
attributes.background: Many EU nationals living here and many EU spouses of British citizens are facing an uncertain future and have endured more than 6 months of stress uncertainty and in some cases harassment. This is the fault of the British government and it's failure to offer assurances to these families.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. It is not clear exactly what form of help you wish to be provided.  You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
